# Smart Expense Tracker
A simple full-stack web app that helps users record and visualize expenses.

## Demo
*(Add your screenshot or link here later)*

## Tech Stack
- **Backend:** Flask (Python 3.10)
- **Frontend:** React
- **Database:** SQLite (demo)

## Features
✅ Add, edit, and delete expenses  
✅ Monthly charts and insights  
✅ Export expenses to CSV  

## Run Locally
### Backend
```bash
cd backend
python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate   # or venv\Scripts\activate on Windows
pip install -r requirements.txt
python app.py
